jobDescription: Flagship Credit Acceptance LLC (“Flagship”) is an independent auto finance company headquartered in Chadds Ford, PA. With regional offices in Irvine, California, Phoenix, Arizona, and Irving, Texas, the company has originated over $6 billion in auto finance contracts, serving over 10,000 automotive dealerships across the country. The company focuses on the mid-tier non-prime credit spectrum of borrowers, providing both indirect and direct automotive financing.  The Senior Data Analyst will be responsible for extracting meaningful insights from the large amounts of data we collect, as well as becoming the Risk and Analytics team’s subject matter expert on all things data related. This person should be capable of developing a deep understanding of the Company’s business, working closely with cross-functional teams, to find the best method to gather, integrate and deliver relevant information which enhances the company's business decision-making capabilities. Acting as the liaison between the business and technical teams, this position will create a well-structured business intelligence environment, ensuring the information is accessible, accurate and compressive.  Candidates should be comfortable with high-growth environments and expected to concurrently manage multiple complex projects and thrive in a fast-paced dynamic organization.
